meanings.definition: A plant of the mustard family with small white flowers and round flat seeds.
meanings.sent1: The pennycress grew quickly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use pennycress to improve soil quality.
meanings.sent3: The pennycress plant had a party with the daisies.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread like pennycress seeds in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The pennycress plant stood out among the other flowers.

meanings.definition: The round flat seed of the pennycress plant.
meanings.sent1: I planted pennycress seeds in the soil.
meanings.sent2: The pennycress seed was small but mighty.
meanings.sent3: The pennycress seed rolled away from the other seeds.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts scattered like pennycress seeds in the field.
meanings.sent5: The pennycress seed held the promise of new growth.
